thread.title: Beyonce scolds assistant on red carpet

title: Beyonce scolds assistant on red carpet
text:
Beyonce scolds assistant on red carpet 12:32 PM Network Vision SHE was only trying to help. Beyonce’s assistant felt the pop queen’s wrath when she got between her and the cameras on the red carpet overnight. People’s Day a hit for Hobart Show 12:28 PM ALEX LUTTRELL UP to 15,000 people are expected to flock to People’s Day at the Royal Hobart Show. 12:17 PM Charlotte Willis A HEARTBROKEN Richie has revealed Bachelorette Sam Frost sent him packing without any real explanation. Cruel Intentions is coming to TV 12:13 PM Staff Writers IT LOOKS like Cruel Intentions is the latest film to be given a reboot, with a small screen adaptation reportedly in the works with NBC. Latest Album Reviews 11:55 AM Cameron Adams and Mikey Cahill - Hit Journalists Will 5 Seconds of Summer extend their 15 minutes? Are Art Vs. Science on the right trajectory? Is You Beauty’s second album a baaaah-you-tay? How have Nathaniel’s pipes developed? Is Kurt Vile going up or down? What to see at the movies right now 11:31 AM Leigh Paatsch National movie reviewer CAN’T decide what movie to see this week? National movie reviewer Leigh Paatsch has every current release covered to make your choice easier. Bond is back — with a bang 11:29 AM Charles Miranda London FIRST REVIEW: From its explosive opening scene, the latest James Bond film Spectre is an exhilarating ride that’s shaping up to be a classic. Beyonce scolds her fanatical personal assistant on the red carpet, saying “Stop it!” October 22, 2015 11:36am The Queen has spoken ... Beyonce scolds her personal assistant. Picture: Getty Network Vision News Corp Australia Network Share Email a friend 
BEYONCE’S assistant felt the wrath when she got between Queen Bey and the cameras at the Tidal X: 1020 event overnight. 
Beyonce lived up to her flawless fashion reputation, hitting the red carpet in a plunging, thigh-high maroon grown complete with ponytail perfection. 
Posing in a fur stole, the confident singer smiled to the cameras vying for her attention. “Right here, queen!” shouted one photographer. Music royalty ... Beyonce attends TIDAL X: 1020 in New York City. Picture: AFP Source: AFP 
While the singer seemed pleased with her appearance, her personal primper Sam Greenberg wouldn’t stop fussing over her dress. 
In the clip that is now going viral, Queen Bey scolds “stop it” through a clenched smile before the distressed assistant scurries out of the limelight. Stop it 
After flaunting her killer curves on the red carpet, Beyonce slipped into a revealing pink jumpsuit, joining hubby Jay-Z on stage. 
The singer went on to thrill the crowd with her first ever live performance with rapper Nicki Minaj to their single Feeling Myself . Beyonce & icki Minaj 
The duo flaunted their famous booties in a raunchy performance, finishing their duet by playfully pretending to square off before giving each other a big hug. 
Usher, TI and Meek Mill were among the host of artists performing, with the event being the first of a series of charity shows put on by the power couple’s music streaming service Tidal. Beyonce and Jay-Z kiss on stage during TIDAL X: 1020. Picture: Getty Source: Supplied Jay-Z and Beyonce perform on stage during TIDAL X: 1020. Picture: Getty Source: Supplied Nicki Minaj and Beyonce perform their single Feeling Myself for the first time. Picture: Getty Source: Getty Images
